content.prompt: Which of the following identifies the principal contrast between the characters of Miss Peecher and Mr. Headstone?

choices.label: She is a teacher, while he is her superior.
She loves him, while he does not love her.
She is a proficient writer, while he is focused on business.
She lives modestly, while he owns an expensive watch.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
